text: perhaps he's emulating shakespeare's henry v, who dressed as a commoner and mingled among them, to find out how he was being perceived by his subjects. course, if he'd have read any of the thirteen hundred e-mails i've sent him on the subject of his administration, he could have saved himself the trouble.
